subtitleNullable: Used and new construction and agriculture equipment values
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Collection of randomly selected used and new construction and agriculture equipment for sale in the United States (sales prices are in USD). Heavy equipment prices vary greatly based on multiple factors that we have included here (manufacturer, category, region, year, hours, etc).


### Content

The data represent prices for used and new heavy equipment including excavators, tractors, combines, dozers, trucks, mowers, applicators etc (you can view all categories at [https://www.equipmentradar.com](https://www.equipmentradar.com) - observe category dropdowns to get an idea of the range of items).

Dataset contains the following labels:
- **category**: Machine category such as excavator, dozer, tractor, etc. 
- **is_new**: Boolean (1=New, 0=Used)
- **manufacturer**: Manufacturer such as Caterpillar, John Deere, Case, New Holland, Kubota, etc
- **region**: Geographic region in United States
- **price**: Price in USD
- **year**: Year machine was manufactured
- **meter_hours**: Number of hours the machine has been used (similar to odometer on a car). **Note** that 0 may represent 0 or not reported.

We have removed specific labels and filtered certain data to protect our clients' privacy in accordance with our Privacy Policy. 

### Acknowledgements & Inspiration

We have found the Data Science and Kaggle communities to be very helpful and inspiring.
title: Heavy Equipment Pricing Data
subtitle: Used and new construction and agriculture equipment values
